General.Name: Applied Energetics
General.Description: Applied Energetics, Inc. engages in the provision of advanced optical technologies and ultrashort pulse directed energy solutions utilizing dual-use laser and optical technologies to defense, national security, industrial, biomedical, and scientific customers worldwide. It develops and holds various intellectual property rights such as laser guided energy and laser induced plasma channel technology for used in high-tech directed energy systems. Applied Energetics, Inc. is headquartered in Tucson, Arizona.
General.Address: 9070 South Rita Road, Tucson, AZ, United States, 85747
